description: The Windows and macOS versions of H&R Block Tax Software 2022 create a T22 file when you save your tax return progress. You can close H&R Block Tax Software 2022 and re-open your T22 file to resume working on your return.
By default, H&R Block Tax Software 2022 saves T22 files in the following directory:
The program also creates a T22 file when you back up your return, by selecting File → Backup Tax Return .

NOTE: The file extension that H&R Block Tax Software appends to your tax return file indicates the year of the return. For example, T22 files are created by H&R Block Tax Software 2022, .T21 files are created by H&R Block Tax Software 2021, and so on.

common_filenames.description: MyTaxes.t22 - Default filename given to H&R Block 2022 tax return files, although you can rename the file.
